summary: Fixes the problem where attacking a vampire or Dawnguard scout sometimes leads to a bounty.
descriptionHtml:
[[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51469]There will be no SE port of this mod. Read here for more information[/url]]

Fixes the problem where attacking a Vampire or Dawnguard scout sometimes leads to a bounty. Considering you're at war, I have a hard time believing the bounty is intended, especially if you've joined the Dawnguard.

Note: This fix is included in the current version of the Unofficial Dawguard Patch.
author: Rooker
